content: If you're experiencing connection issues, first check your internet connection and try refreshing the page. Clear your browser cache if problems persist.
API rate limits are set at 1000 requests per hour per API key. Exceeding this limit will result in HTTP 429 responses.
To integrate our API, use the provided SDK or make direct HTTP requests to our REST endpoints. Authentication requires a valid API key in the header.
Database maintenance windows occur every Sunday from 2-4 AM UTC. Plan accordingly for any scheduled operations.
POLICY: Do not provide direct database access or SSH credentials to customers. Escalate data export requests to technical team. Only provide API-based solutions for data access.
System outages affecting multiple customers must be reported immediately to engineering team. Provide status page updates within 15 minutes of confirmed outage.
POLICY: Custom integrations requiring code review must be escalated to engineering. Do not provide unofficial API endpoints or undocumented features to customers.
Mobile app issues: First check app version and device compatibility. iOS requires version 14+, Android requires API level 26+. Guide users through app store update process.
Performance issues should be diagnosed with specific metrics: page load times, API response times, error rates. Request browser network logs for web app performance issues.
